name: Heal
description: Restores a small amount of HP

name: Healmore
description: Restores a large amount of HP

name: Blaze
description: Burns an enemy with a small burst of flame

name: Blazemore
description: Burns an enemy in a large firestorm

name: Sleep
description: Puts a group of foes to sleep

name: Stopspell
description: Prevents spell usage in a group of foes

name: Repel
description: Prevents encounters against weak monsters, or makes them flee battle
